welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Neuenburg am Rhein, the charming city known for its rich history and picturesque views of the Rhine River. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for budget airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Euroairport France Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
